name: Night Agent: I'm the Savior
description: The mission of the night agents in Night Agent: I’m the Savior is an entirely new challenge for players. Play as agents with strong combat abilities. Fight the demons with unstoppable tactics and teamwork. Students with normal appearance carry a mission to protect the city’s safety. Join them to discover your potential. Turn busy and deserted streets into endless battlefields. Enjoy a beautiful 3D fighting action game with an accompanying storyline that couldn’t be more engaging.
